channel.title: Script not working
channel.description: ok my friend is learning how to make scr by eaditing an existing script and he made this one gowrong and i cant find the point which he made weird i didnt make this script nor did he he got it off a website anywho can someone please tell me whats wrong with it and how to correct it please thanx oh yeah its ment to be a auto woodcutter and banker

item.title: Script not working
item.dc:creator: @existingqwer existingqwer
item.description:
@existingqwer wrote:

I don’t have SCAR on this computer so I’m not sure if this is the only error, but the declareplayers procedure is messed up. You can’t say that HowManyPlayers=1 when you have 3 player slots. If you don’t want to use certain players change Active to False, or when changing howmanyplayers delete that players slot. Here’s it fixed:

[code]procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers := 3;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
CurrentPlayer := 0;

Players[0].Name := ‘(put ur user here)’;
Players[0].Pass := ‘(put ur pass here)’;
Players[0].Nick := ‘(the first 3 or 4 letters of your user)’; //3 - 4 letters of YOUR username, example: zima
Players[0].Active := True;
Players[0].Integer1 := 100; //Amount of loads

Players[1].Name := ‘’;
Players[1].Pass := ‘’;
Players[1].Nick := ‘’; //3 - 4 letters of YOUR username, example: zima
Players[1].Active := False;
Players[1].Integer1 := 100; //Amount of loads

Players[2].Name := ‘’;
Players[2].Pass := ‘’;
Players[2].Nick := ‘’; //3 - 4 letters of YOUR username, example: zima
Players[2].Active := False;
Players[2].Integer1 := 100; //Amount of loads
end;[/code]

Read full topic
